A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I hardly know where to begin. The horrid pacing\, the lack of plot\, leaving questions unanswered\, trying to do a soft reboot of Empire only in reverse order?   This was an awful movie in and of itself\, even if you don't examine it as a piece of a larger work.Disney\,   Please please please either go the full Star Trek alternate timeline route if you want beloved characters acting completely out of character or just write stories that are in the Star Wars universe but have minimal connection to the originals. For love of Yoda just pick one or the other.
